rooms.description: An inviting entrance hall leading into the main living area, designed to welcome natural light and provide seamless transition from outdoors.
Spacious living room with large windows oriented towards the east for optimal morning sunlight, enhancing natural ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen with integrated storage solutions and an eastern outlook for positive energy flow.
Open dining area adjacent to the living room, providing a harmonious space for family meals with ample natural light.
A master bedroom with south-facing orientation, featuring a spacious balcony to enhance ventilation and provide views of the garden.
Secondary bedroom with a western view, including a private balcony to ensure ample natural light and airflow.
Additional bedroom designed for guest use or children, equipped with a balcony to promote open space and fresh air.
Well-lit bathroom ensuring privacy with windows placed strategically according to Vastu for optimal energy flow.

openings.description: The main entrance is positioned on the south side to ensure a favorable flow of energy and ease of access.
East-facing window that maximizes morning sunlight, aligning with Vastu for positive energy.
Balcony door ensuring secure and convenient access from the master bedroom to its balcony.
Service exit positioned on the north side for utilities, emergency egress, and functional layout.

swimming_pool.description: A modern swimming pool designed with aesthetic appeal and relaxation in mind, complementing the overall Vastu-compliant layout.

home_theater.description: Home theater area integrated within the living space, offering a dedicated entertainment zone without compromising natural light in other areas.
